pages.text: The first thing you need to do, when you spawn into a new world is to search for a $(thing)Tree$() and punching it until $(item)Logs$() drops. $(br)$(li)Gather a bunch of Logs then open your inventory to turn the $(item)Logs$() into $(item)Planks$(). $(br)$(li)Then use 4 $(item)Planks$() in your mini crafting grid to create a $(item)Crafting Table$().
$(li)Now craft with $(item)Planks$() some $(item)Sticks$() and with both of them a $(item)Wooden Pickaxe$().
$(li)Then find some $(item)Stone$() (on mountains or below the dirt), mine them with your $(item)Pickaxe$() and craft all standard $(item)Tools$() from it.

$(li)The next step is searching $(item)Food$(), for quick food kill some $(thing)Animals$() with your $(item)Sword$() and cook the flesh in an $(item)Furnace$(). $(br2)You can use $(item)Wood$() or $(item)Coal$() as fuel. $(br)$(li)And if you have found $(thing)Cows$(), you should craft $(item)Armor$() out of the $(item)Leather$().
